content.title: First Rib Resection
content.definition: Key component of TOS decompression. Complete resection posterior to anterior essential for success.
content.statement: First Rib Resection is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Thoracic-Outlet-Syndrome that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding First Rib Resection helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of First Rib Resection include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of First Rib Resection.

clinical_pearls: Key point about First Rib Resection

citations.source: UpToDate. (2024). First Rib Resection. Wolters Kluwer.
Harrison's Principles of Internal Medicine, 21st ed. McGraw-Hill.
